COMMENT: Mar 27: The Mets signed Alzolay to a two-year minor-league contract Friday, Will Sammon of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Christian Scott
COMMENT: Mar 5: Scott will throw from 45 feet Monday as he continues his recovery from hybrid elbow surgery performed last September, Will Sammon of The Athletic reports.

NAME: Oliver Ortega
COMMENT: Mar 2: Ortega (elbow) signed a minor-league contract with the Mets that includes an invitation to spring training Sunday, Jon Morosi of MLB Networkreports.

NAME: Nick Madrigal
COMMENT: Feb 28: Madrigal will likely miss the entire season after surgery to repair a fractured left shoulder, Tim Healey of Newsday reports.

NAME: Luke Weaver
COMMENT: Jun 1: Weaver suffered hamstring discomfort while warming up to potentially enter Sunday's 7-3 win over the Dodgers, Erik Boland of Newsday reports.

NAME: Jasson Dominguez
COMMENT: Jun 1: Dominguez exited Sunday's contest against the Dodgers in the top of the sixth inning with a left thumb contusion, Jorge Castillo of ESPN.com reports.

NAME: Jake Cousins
COMMENT: Jun 1: Cousins (forearm/pectoral) is expected to begin a rehab assignment Tuesday, Gary Phillips of the New York Daily News reports.

NAME: Marcus Stroman
COMMENT: Jun 1: Stroman (knee) tossed live batting practice in Los Angeles on Saturday, Greg Joyce of the New York Post reports.

NAME: Jazz Chisholm Jr.
COMMENT: Jun 1: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said Friday that Chisholm (oblique) could be activated from the IL as soon as Tuesday and confirmed that the versatile veteran will play third base upon his return, Bryan Hoch of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Giancarlo Stanton
COMMENT: Jun 1: Stanton (elbows) has been taking at-bats at the Yankees' complex in Tampa, but manager Aaron Boone said the slugger is not likely to be ready to come off the injured list next week, Bryan Hoch of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Fernando Cruz
COMMENT: May 31: Cruz (shoulder) threw a bullpen session Saturday, Erik Boland of Newsday reports.

NAME: Luis Gil
COMMENT: May 30: Gil (lat) threw a bullpen session Friday, Gary Phillips of the New York Daily News reports.

NAME: JT Brubaker
COMMENT: May 26: Brubaker (ribs) made the second appearance of his rehab assignment Friday with Double-A Somerset, covering 2.2 innings and allowing two runs (one earned) on one hit and three walks. He didn't strike out a batter in the outing.

NAME: Oswaldo Cabrera
COMMENT: May 16: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said Friday that it's "probably unlikely" Cabrera (ankle) returns this season, Greg Joyce of the New York Post reports.

NAME: Gerrit Cole
COMMENT: May 5: Cole (elbow) said that he plans to begin a throwing program in August, Pete Caldera of The Bergen Record reports.

NAME: Chase Hampton
COMMENT: Mar 26: Hampton underwent Tommy John surgery Friday, Greg Joyce of the New York Post reports.

NAME: Aaron Nola
COMMENT: Jun 1: Nola (ankle) threw a bullpen session ahead of Sunday's series finale versus the Brewers, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Bryce Harper
COMMENT: Jun 1: Harper (elbow) is out of the lineup for Sunday's game against the Brewers.

NAME: Nabil Crismatt
COMMENT: May 30: The Phillies signed Crismatt to a minor-league contract on Dec. 13.

NAME: Griff McGarry
COMMENT: May 20: Triple-A Lehigh Valley reinstated McGarry (undisclosed) from the 7-day injured list Friday.

NAME: Matt Kroon
COMMENT: Apr 9: no

NAME: Christian McGowan
COMMENT: Mar 31: McGowan will miss the remainder of the season following Tommy John surgery, Jonathan Mayo of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Nick Gonzales
COMMENT: Jun 1: Gonzales (ankle) went 3-for-5 in a rehab appearance with Triple-A Indianapolis on Friday.

NAME: Darick Hall
COMMENT: May 30: The Pirates reassigned Hall to minor-league camp Tuesday.

NAME: Johan Oviedo
COMMENT: May 29: Oviedo (lat) is throwing side sessions without any discomfort, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Colin Holderman
COMMENT: May 29: Holderman (thumb) received a cortisone injection Wednesday and will not throw for at least one week, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Justin Lawrence
COMMENT: May 21: Lawrence recently received a platelet-rich plasma injection in his right elbow and will rest for three weeks before beginning a throwing program, Danny Demilio of PittsburghBaseballNow.com reports.

NAME: Jared Jones
COMMENT: May 21: The Pirates announced that Jones underwent successful surgery Wednesday to repair the UCL in his right elbow. Jones is projected to return to full competition in 10-to-12 months.

NAME: Enmanuel Valdez
COMMENT: May 21: Pirates director of sports medicine Todd Tomczyk said Wednesday that Valdez recently underwent season-ending surgery on his dislocated left shoulder, Danny Demilio of PittsburghBaseballNow.com reports.

NAME: Malcom Nunez
COMMENT: May 15: The Pirates re-signed Nunez to a minor-league contract with an invitation to spring training Friday, Francys Romero of BeisbolFR.com reports.

NAME: Anthony Solometo
COMMENT: May 14: Double-A Altoona placed Solometo on the 60-day injured list May 7 with a left shoulder injury.

NAME: Dauri Moreta
COMMENT: Apr 29: Moreta (elbow) will begin a rehab assignment with Single-A Bradenton on Tuesday.

NAME: Tim Mayza
COMMENT: Apr 24: Mayza (shoulder) was transferred to the 60-day injured list Thursday, Colin Beazley of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reports.

NAME: Gavin Sheets
COMMENT: Jun 1: Sheets (undisclosed) exited Sunday's contest versus the Pirates in the top of the fourth inning after colliding with the outfield wall, Jake Rill of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Yu Darvish
COMMENT: Jun 1: Darvish (elbow) is expected to throw a bullpen session in San Francisco on Tuesday, AJ Cassavell of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Bryan Hoeing
COMMENT: May 26: Hoeing (shoulder) struck out two batters and allowed one hit over a scoreless inning in his latest rehab appearance Friday with Double-A San Antonio.

NAME: Michael King
COMMENT: May 25: The Padres placed King on the 15-day injured list Sunday due to right shoulder inflammation.

NAME: Jason Heyward
COMMENT: May 24: Heyward isn't in the lineup for Saturday's game against Atlanta.

NAME: Mason McCoy
COMMENT: May 21: McCoy (finger) began a rehab assignment with Triple-A El Paso on Tuesday, going 1-for-4 with two RBI.

NAME: Joe Musgrove
COMMENT: May 18: Musgrove (elbow) is expected to begin throwing from 90 feet during the upcoming week, per MLB.com.

NAME: Ethan Salas
COMMENT: May 13: Padres general manager A.J. Preller said Monday that Salas has been diagnosed with a stress reaction in his lower back and is expected to remain out until July, AJ Cassavell of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jhony Brito
COMMENT: May 12: Brito underwent a UCL internal brace surgery and a repair of his flexor tendon last month and will miss the entire 2025 season, AJ Cassavell of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Logan Gillaspie
COMMENT: Apr 27: The Padres placed Gillaspie on the 15-day injured list Sunday due to a left oblique strain.

NAME: Helcris Olivarez
COMMENT: Jun 1: The Giants re-signed Olivarez to a minor-league contract Friday that includes an invitation to spring training, Shayna Rubin of the San Francisco Chronicle reports.

NAME: Justin Verlander
COMMENT: May 31: Manager Bob Melvin said Saturday that Verlander (pectoral) isn't expected to make his next start, Shayna Rubin of the San Francisco Chronicle reports.

NAME: Jerar Encarnacion
COMMENT: May 28: Encarnacion played six innings and went 1-for-2 with a solo home run, a stolen base and a walk in Triple-A Sacramento's 9-5 loss to El Paso on Tuesday.

NAME: Tom Murphy
COMMENT: May 12: Murphy (back) will be re-evaluated in six weeks, Alex Pavlovic of NBC Sports Bay Area reports.

NAME: Cole Waites
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Giants reassigned Waites to minor-league camp Wednesday, Justice delos Santos of The San Jose Mercury News reports.

NAME: Ethan Small
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Giants reassigned Small to minor-league camp Wednesday, Justice delos Santos of The San Jose Mercury News reports.

NAME: Ryan Murphy
COMMENT: Mar 27: no

NAME: Trent Thornton
COMMENT: Jun 1: Thornton (abdomen) started a minor-league rehab assignment with Triple-A Tacoma on Friday, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Logan Gilbert
COMMENT: May 29: Gilbert (elbow) threw 1.2 innings, allowing one earned run on two hits and two walks while striking out three during a rehab appearance with Triple-A Tacoma on Thursday, Adam Jude of The Seattle Times reports.

NAME: Victor Robles
COMMENT: May 27: Mariners general manager Justin Hollander said Tuesday that Robles (shoulder) may not return until September, Tim Booth of the Seattle Times reports.

NAME: Luke Raley
COMMENT: May 27: The Mariners are targeting next week for Raley (oblique) to begin a rehab assignment, Daniel Kramer of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Gregory Santos
COMMENT: Apr 29: The Mariners placed Santos on the 15-day injured list Friday with right knee inflammation.

NAME: Ryan Bliss
COMMENT: Apr 13: The Mariners transferred Bliss (biceps) from the 10-day injured list to the 60-day IL on Sunday.

NAME: Cade Marlowe
COMMENT: Mar 27: Marlowe was outrighted to Triple-A Tacoma on Friday after clearing waivers.

NAME: Taylor Dollard
COMMENT: Feb 26: Dollard will have labrum surgery and is out for the rest of the season, Ryan Divish of The Seattle Times reports.

NAME: Jordan Walker
COMMENT: Jun 1: Cardinals manager Oliver Marmol said Saturday that he expects Walker (wrist) back from the 10-day injured list "pretty soon," Daniel Guerrero of the St. Louis Post-Dispatch reports.

NAME: Zack Thompson
COMMENT: May 23: Thompson is back in St. Louis to be re-evaluated after suffering  a setback with his injured left lat, John Denton of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Quinn Mathews
COMMENT: May 19: Mathews (shoulder) has been sent to the rookie-level Florida Complex League Cardinals to begin a rehab assignment.

NAME: Cooper Hjerpe
COMMENT: Apr 15: Double-A Springfield transferred Hjerpe (elbow) from the 7-day injured list to the full season injured list Tuesday.

NAME: Packy Naughton
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Cardinals re-signed Naughton (elbow) to a two-year, minor-league contract Monday, Jeff Jones of the Belleville News-Democrat reports.

NAME: Victor Santos
COMMENT: Mar 27: Santos (elbow) has compiled a 3.97 ERA, 1.38 WHIP and 26:7 K:BB across 34 innings over his first nine outings (seven starts) in the Dominican Winter League.

NAME: Jonny DeLuca
COMMENT: May 27: DeLuca was pulled off his rehab assignment Tuesday after suffering a setback with his right shoulder strain, Marc Topkin of the Tampa Bay Times reports.

NAME: Travis Jankowski
COMMENT: May 27: Jankowski (groin) will begin a rehab assignment Wednesday at Triple-A Durham, Marc Topkin of the Tampa Bay Times reports.

NAME: Shane McClanahan
COMMENT: May 24: McClanahan (triceps) threw from 90 feet Friday, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Ha-Seong Kim
COMMENT: May 24: Rays manager Kevin Cash said Saturday that Kim (shoulder) is slated to begin a rehab assignment with Triple-A Durham on Monday, Ryan Bass of FanDuel Sports Network Sun reports.

NAME: Hunter Bigge
COMMENT: May 21: Bigge experienced renewed soreness with his right lat Wednesday and won't begin a rehab assignment Friday with Triple-A Durham as had been planned, Marc Topkin of the Tampa Bay Times reports.

NAME: Eloy Jimenez
COMMENT: May 19: Jimenez was placed on the 7-day injured list at Triple-A Durham on Monday due to right Achilles tendinitis, Marc Topkin of the Tampa Bay Times reports.

NAME: Nate Lavender
COMMENT: May 13: Lavender (elbow) is scheduled to throw his first true bullpen session of the season Tuesday, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Alex Faedo
COMMENT: May 7: Faedo (shoulder) has been shut down from throwing due to neck and shoulder tightness, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Richie Palacios
COMMENT: May 2: Palacios (knee) has begun jogging on a treadmill, MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jonathan Hernandez
COMMENT: Apr 9: The Rays reassigned Hernandez to minor-league camp Monday.

NAME: Evan Carter
COMMENT: Jun 1: The Rangers are expected to activate Carter (quadriceps) from the 10-day injured list ahead of Tuesday's series opener at Tampa Bay, Jeff Wilson of AllDLLS.com reports.

NAME: Kumar Rocker
COMMENT: Jun 1: Rocker (shoulder) is expected to be reinstated from the 15-day injured list to start Wednesday against the Rays, Shawn McFarland of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Nathan Eovaldi
COMMENT: Jun 1: Manager Bruce Bochy said Friday that Eovaldi (triceps) will have his next turn through the rotation pushed back a few days, Kennedi Landry of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Chris Martin
COMMENT: May 31: Martin (shoulder) will toss a bullpen session Sunday, Shawn McFarland of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Chad Wallach
COMMENT: May 30: Wallach signed a minor-league contract with the Rangers on Sunday, which includes an invitation to spring training, Jon Morosi of MLB Network reports.

NAME: Joc Pederson
COMMENT: May 25: Pederson fractured his right hand during Saturday's 10-5 loss to the White Sox and said after the game that he expects to be out for around six weeks, Shawn McFarland of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Cody Bradford
COMMENT: May 12: Bradford (elbow) will throw a bullpen session Thursday, Shawn McFarland of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Dane Acker
COMMENT: May 8: Acker (undisclosed) was reinstated from High-A Hickory's 7-day injured list May 24 and has covered five innings while striking out seven and allowing two earned runs on four hits and three walks over his first two starts of the 2023 season.

NAME: Jon Gray
COMMENT: May 1: Gray (wrist) has been cleared to do some light throwing next week, Shawn McFarland of The Dallas Morning News reports.

NAME: Malcolm Moore
COMMENT: Apr 17: Moore was placed on the injured list at High-A Hub City on Thursday with a broken finger on his right hand, Kennedi Landry of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jax Biggers
COMMENT: Mar 30: The Rangers signed Biggers to a minor-league contract and gave him an invitation to spring training Thursday.

NAME: Josh Sborz
COMMENT: Feb 17: The Rangers placed Sborz (shoulder) on the 60-day injured list Monday.

NAME: Daulton Varsho
COMMENT: Jun 1: The Blue Jays placed Varsho on the 10-day injured list Sunday due to a left hamstring strain.

NAME: Tyler Heineman
COMMENT: May 31: Heineman (concussion) will begin a rehab assignment at Triple-A Buffalo on Saturday, Arden Zwelling of Sportsnet.ca reports.

NAME: Max Scherzer
COMMENT: May 30: Scherzer (thumb) faced hitters on the field Friday at Rogers Centre, Keegan Matheson of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Anthony Santander
COMMENT: May 30: The Blue Jays placed Santander on the 10-day injured list Friday due to left shoulder inflammation.

NAME: Ryan Burr
COMMENT: May 29: Burr (shoulder) received a cortisone injection Thursday to help treat his right shoulder inflammation, Arden Zwelling of Sportsnet.ca reports.

NAME: Andres Gimenez
COMMENT: May 28: Gimenez (quadriceps) was cleared to begin a rehab assignment with Single-A Dunedin on Wednesday, Arden Zwelling of Sportsnet.ca reports.

NAME: Nick Sandlin
COMMENT: May 26: Sandlin (lat) is throwing a bullpen Monday at the Blue Jays' Florida complex, Arden Zwelling of Sportsnet.ca reports.

NAME: Yimi Garcia
COMMENT: May 26: Garcia (shoulder) received a cortisone shot Monday and will be shut down from throwing for a few days, Arden Zwelling of Sportsnet.ca reports.

NAME: Alek Manoah
COMMENT: May 26: Manoah (elbow) has built up to 40 pitches during regular twice-a-week bullpen sessions as he recovers from elbow surgery, Mitch Bannon of the Athletic reports.

NAME: Josh Kasevich
COMMENT: Mar 27: Kasevich will be sidelined several weeks after aggravating a stress reaction in his lower back in a game last weekend, Arden Zwelling of Sportsnet.ca reports.

NAME: Angel Bastardo
COMMENT: Mar 12: The Rangers placed Bastardo (elbow) on the 60-day injured list Wednesday, Keegan Matheson of MLB.com reports.

NAME: Jacob Young
COMMENT: May 23: Young (shoulder) remains out of the lineup for Thursday's game against Atlanta.

NAME: Dylan Crews
COMMENT: May 21: Crews was removed from Tuesday's game against Atlanta with a left lower-back injury, Mark Zuckerman of MASNSports.com reports.

NAME: Jarlin Susana
COMMENT: May 11: Double-A Harrisburg placed Susana on its 7-day injured list Saturday due to a Grade 1 UCL sprain in his right elbow, Mark Zuckerman of MASNSports.com reports.

NAME: Derek Law
COMMENT: May 9: Law (forearm) is slated to throw off a mound before the end of this week, Mark Zuckerman of MASNSports.com reports.

NAME: Orlando Ribalta
COMMENT: May 9: Ribalta (biceps) will throw a 20-to-25 pitch bullpen session Saturday, Mark Zuckerman of MASNSports.com reports.

NAME: Paul DeJong
COMMENT: Apr 29: DeJong isn't expected to return from the 10-day injured list for at least two months after undergoing surgery Monday to repair his nose and sinuses, Bob Nightengale of USA Today reports. He also had a titanium orbital plate inserted as part of the procedure.

NAME: DJ Herz
COMMENT: Apr 16: Nationals manager Dave Martinez confirmed that Herz (elbow) underwent Tommy John surgery Wednesday in Dallas, Andrew Golden of The Washington Post reports.

NAME: Tyler Stuart
COMMENT: Apr 3: The Nationals promoted Stuart from Double-A Harrisburg to Triple-A Rochester on Tuesday.

NAME: Mason Thompson
COMMENT: Feb 19: Nationals manager Dave Martinez said Friday that Thompson (elbow) has a chance to be ready in time for Opening Day, Spencer Nusbaum of The Washington Post reports.

NAME: Josiah Gray
COMMENT: Feb 16: The Nationals placed Gray (elbow) on the 60-day injured list Sunday, Andrew Golden of The Washington Post reports.
